about_the_game:
"

Devin Night Pack 176: WOTW Alien Creatures

Lurking in the wretched radiated ruins of the forlorn future new threats lie in wait! 32 deadly denizens of the wastes are eager to sink their teeth and talons into your heroes! From terrifying tick masters to shifty Shintoans and Killjoy Kangorians, this pack also has weaponized canine companions, for a well rounded adventuring party. Don’t wait, populate your wasteland today!
